constituent: rot, borough, municipality, cave, adhere, sellotape, person, glue, meat, inside, belt, person, person2
koohiiStory1: The rotting meat adheres to the cave walls.
koohiiStory2: Smaller municipalities are well known for filling their budgets with pork (meat). Thats why they are also well known for being rotten.
kunYomi: くさ.る、-くさ.る、くさ.れる、くさ.れ、くさ.らす、くさ.す
readingExamples: 腐らす (くさ.らす), 腐る (くさ.る), 腐れる (くさ.れる)
